entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • use of webp extension as backgroundimage #105052
  • Replace `AdvSimd` intrinsics with `(vec & cns) == zero` #105047
  • Update our runtime-deps packages to provide guidance for users on Ubuntu 24.04 #105046
  • Trimmer reports IL2122 even if trim warnings are suppressed #105044
    9.0.0
  • JIT unnecessary stack load/stores for tail jump with stack args involved #105031
    Future
  • Some delegate invoke thunks fail to compile with `where T : allows ref struct` delegates #105029
    9.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs 8.0.1 package needed to resolve System.Formats.Asn1 vulnerability #105028
  • [browser] Update runtime's DevServer to match Blazor's updates in 9 #105025
    9.0.0
  • System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests failures for ppc64le #105020
    Future
  • Need information about KB5039889 and SHA256 unsafe thread usage #105013
  • table index is out of bounds in Mono WASM ST #105010
  • Test failure: profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #105005
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Add a type static class at the CLR level #104869
    Future
  • NativeAOT difference in behavior to ILLink with descriptor preserved code and constant propagation #85161
    9.0.0
  • exception_handling/pal_sxs/test1/paltest_pal_sxs_test1 failure in CI #104968
  • [API Proposal]: Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102492
    9.0.0
  • System.Uri.TryCreate succeeds where new System.Uri fails. #105024
  • [Perf] Regressions from cross-block local assertion prop #95645
    9.0.0
  • GCInfo: Save bits in Code Offset encoding #5677
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `TagList` constructor to `Measurement` #104015
    9.0.0
  • HttpClient ignores 413 error response #104678
    Future
  • PR_SET_PDEATHSIG support on linux #96470
    Future
  • Process.GetProcesses returns truncated 15 char string on OSX #29330
    9.0.0
  • Issue with Azerbaijani ("az-AZ") Culture in .NET 8 Blazor WebAssembly Standalone App #105018
  • [blazor-wasm] Improve handling OOM error, and surface it better #95971
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Set -sMAXIMUM_MEMORY to 256 MiB by default #84638
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Web API + ICU #79989
    9.0.0
  • Question: reusing HttpResponseMessage/HttpContent #105015
    Future
  • [ICU] Tracking issue for all culture, language and translation problems #70781
    9.0.0
  • Undocumented Change in behavior for GetTempPath in .NET 6.0.32 and Framework 4.8.1 #105012
    6.0.32
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.StartInfo_BadExe(useShellExecute: False) #104770
    9.0.0
  • Possible locking issues in PollingWildCardChangeToken? #103997
    9.0.0
  • AOT compiler should error out gracefully instead of crashing #103901
    9.0.0
  • Disabling/filtering query parameters for URIs in HTTP tracing #74340
    9.0.0
  • Automate parts of the PackageOverrides.txt #104639
  • [Mono Android][Test] Runtime tests couldn't pass build for Android target #44642
    9.0.0
  • Problem with LibraryImport Generated Code #104567
    9.0.0
  • Access violation while finding shadow stack pointer in nativeaot/SmokeTests/UnitTests #104628
    9.0.0
  • JIT: check-debug diffs in windows arm64 SPMI #93499
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Test Sve pipeline #105053
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove DbgGet*Random* macros and constant arguments #105051
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2497275 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Include new warning codes in --notrimwarn and --noaotwarn #105049
    needs-area-label
  • Instructions for adding a native external library dependency #105045
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] Pass a delegate into Target #105043
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't do aggressive block compaction too early #105041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move the NoGC helper classification to HelperCallProperties #105040
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary `SYSLIB1056` suppressions #105039
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Revert "Use generic math for floating point formatting" for Single and Double #105038
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix the ExposedLocalsNumbering test #105037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove unnecessary `IDE0060` suppressions #105036
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [Flaky Test] Change request to POST to avoid retry on server Shutdown #105035
    area-System.Net.Http, test-bug
  • [eventpipe][tests] Reenable eventsourceerror non-arm32 unix platforms #105033
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Add JsonEnumMemberNameAttribute. #105032
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Add Sve.GatherVectorUInt*ZeroExtendFirstFaulting() #105030
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [browser] Trigger relink on `EmccMaximumHeapSize` change #105027
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser
  • remove false statement from the docs (negative values were never allowed) #105026
    documentation, area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Remove unused GETFIELD/SETFIELD helpers #105023
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix passing float and uint arguments in VM #105021
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Require package readmes for shipping packages #105019
    area-Meta
  • Replace the bespoke OrderedDictionary with a backport of System.Collections.Generic.OrderedDictionary #105016
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Expose the TarEntry start of the data stream #105007
    new-api-needs-documentation, partner-impact, area-System.Formats.Tar, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Issue #103365 follow-up PR #105006
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Arm64/Sve: Fix a SVE issue and add CI leg for testing SVE with AltJit #104998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix testcase for ILC behavior with preserved generated code #105042
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Ensure that the handling for the V128_BITCAST APIs is correctly performant on Mono WASM #105009
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implement new `TagsList` constructor on `Measurement` #105011
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix mach hardware exception forwarding #105003
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Add `MultiplyAddRotateComplexBySelectedScalar` #105002
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • [release/6.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104756
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104755
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup
  • Add libicu74 as a known ICU version #104754
    os-linux, area-Setup, 9.0.0
  • cDac work necessary to get the MethodTableName #104759
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • JIT: Improve strength reduction's prediction of loop reversal #104800
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Check return value of `InitializeCursors` #105017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Windows CNG virtualization-based security #102495
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Value num refine phis #104752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix SSP restoring in edge cases #104820
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Added Sve.CreateBreakPropagateMask #104704
    arch-arm64, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #104336
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Automate the creation of the sfx PackageOverrides.txt file #104971
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • #ifdef out of the DACCESS_BUILD the GetMethodDescForSlot api #104989
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix superpmi collect failure for crossgen2 on linux x64 and windows x86 #104181
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Don't make web requests in HttpClient trimming test #104718
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [wasm] Improve handling OOM error #104963
    arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • Disable failing BinaryFormatter tests on ppc64le #105022
    needs-area-label
  • Console beep: perform the sys-call directly #104966
    area-System.Console, 9.0.0
  • [Loader][tests] Add more logging to pinpoint BinderTracingTests hang #104982
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • don't rely on error code returned on Windows Nano #104973
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-windows-nano, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • fix possible locking issue in PollingWildCardChangeToken #104969
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix aot compiler crash when checking for method signature #104903
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix detection of ENGINE APIs with OpenSSL 3 #105001
    area-System.Security
  • Use OverloadResolutionPriority with Debug/Trace.Assert(string) #104942
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Replace more Unsafe.SizeOf<T> with sizeof(T) #104923
    area-Meta
  • Fix case-insensitive check for loopback in Uri #105008
    area-System.Net
  • Redact query from HttpTelemetry #104970
    area-System.Net
  • Disable tests for illumos that depend on a pre-built nethost binary #104447
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Optimize BOX+UNBOX for "T? -> T" and "T -> T?" #104931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Qualify the well-known IntPtr SpecialTypeInfo instance #104758
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [NativeAOT] When reconciling shadow stack after catch, use more precise way to figure how much to pop. #104652
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Introduce IBufferedLogger #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • OpenSSL providers support #104961
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Emit More EventSource Data For Metrics Measurements #104993
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, 9.0.0
  • fix broken Select with error list on macOS #104915
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-mac-os-x
  • [NO REVIEW] Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Define equals manually for Swift JitInterface InlineArray types. #104843
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LowerHWIntrinsicGetElement for xarch #104987
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve the handling of SIMD comparisons #104944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump LLVM to 19.x branch #103585
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Ensure `ISimdVector` default implementations throw documented exceptions #104831
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Remove MONO ifdef from Vector128 bitcasts #104694
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Remove class constraint from Interlocked.{Compare}Exchange #104558
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • Fix feature switch IL when feature attributes are removed #104995
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add runtime metrics in `System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource` #104680
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • Avoid scanning typeof checks when building whole program view #103883
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Increasing the tolerance for Mono Runtime for the flaky ProcessThreadTests.TestStartTimeProperty test #104972
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, test-enhancement, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix a set of minor DAC bugs I encountered recently #104919
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Replace use of target dependent `TestZ` intrinsic #104488
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Added SVE `GetFfr`, `SetFfr`, `LoadVectorFirstFaulting`, `GatherVectorFirstFaulting` #104502
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Fixes from API review approvals #104990
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adds `SpanSplitEnumerator` #104534
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • NativeAOT/win/arm64: Fix the reloc type typo #104516
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in callback returns #104949
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Interop-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics for work in .NET 10 #103318
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Tracing out of proc sampling #104134
    area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Expose the Sin, Cos, and SinCos methods on the Vector types #104848
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition() #103528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Light up support for OpenSSL ENGINEs only if they are available. #104994
    area-System.Security
  • [browser] Use StaticWebAssets fingerprinting in Wasm SDK #103755
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • BinaryFormatter bug fix #104896
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Error out when the size of a field is too big #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `in` on `Unsafe.AreSame` callsites #105000
    community-contribution, needs-author-action, needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Remove "nuget.org" references in WBT #104806
    Security, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix KeyAvailable and ReadKey() in ConsolePal.Windows. #104984
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Remove Mono LLVMJIT builds #104552
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.LoadVector*FirstFaulting APIs #104964
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Add support for `SwiftSelf<T>` in Mono JIT and Interpreter #104171
    area-Codegen-meta-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `GTF_IND_INVARIANT` and `GTF_IND_NONFAULTING` flags checking #104976
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Convert Perl scripts to C# in coreclr #104867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Add the new Lock type to Concurrent Dicionary #104575
    area-System.Collections
  • add support of TLS 1.3 on macOS POC #104835
    area-System.Net.Security, os-mac-os-x

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question]: why is c++ 11 not installed in the root fs on the linux distros? #2623

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Post-merge tasks #2472

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement automatic finalization #2634

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Merge to Jul 10 #2632

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] add some steps for wasi linux x64 #2605
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • It_does_not_download_desktop_targeting_packs_on_unix doesn't work for SDK redist (only redist-installer) #42230
  • [9.0-preview.7] Microsoft.DotNet.MSBuildWorkloadSdkResolver fails with dotnet workload or build on Windows #42211

Closed

  • calling dotnet publish with output multiple times creates new subfolder each time #42223
  • Allow pinning Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref version #42199

PullRequests

Created

  • Disable crossgen when poisoning #42228
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fix subpath issue on SWA dev manifest #42227
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #42224
    Branch Lockdown
  • Report better error when `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package is not downloaded #42216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package description #42212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #42205
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support to generate SBRP usage report #42200
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit loose manifest priority #41996
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Workloads, 8.0.8
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #42213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] update warning message for containers package inclusion #40628
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Mark the new `Microsoft.Net.Sdk.Compilers.Toolset` package as shipping #42208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix expected exit code for mono in source-build smoke tests #42209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #41936
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Mono Stage 2 Leg to VMR SB #41606
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Onboard Installer EndToEnd tests to Helix #42195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automated test to verify that the custom culture is respected #42174
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix userlocal #41735
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload History (part 4) #42020
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Better conversion from collection expression with `ReadOnlySpan<T>` overloads #8297

PullRequests

Created

  • Add open questions for LDM #8296

Merged

  • Fix definite assignment example in field keyword proposal #8266
  • Remove ldm history from the speclet #8292
  • fix anchor text #8290
  • Fix lists in an LDM note #8295

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "dotnet build-server shutdown" warning for missing dll #74430
  • Debug assert triggered for interpolated string convserion #74427
  • False positive CS8618 null reference type warning when using required members and [SetsRequiredMembers] in derived class #74423
  • Syntax highlight is half broken in both VS 17.10 and VS 17.11 P3 #74422
  • Hovering over a method gives the wrong overload #74418
  • How to prevent visual studio from inserting <see langword=""/> in comments #74417
  • Syntax highlight colors differ between Dark and System modes #74416

Closed

  • Replacing using System with #include <stdio.h> in Roslyn C# Syntax Tree Rewriter #74426
  • Rename silently fails when "Rename symbol's file" is selected #72489
  • C# rename default constructor argument which is used as a property #74425
  • [Bug]: funny interaction between verbatim strings and the preprocessor #74415
  • primary constructor variables are not visible during debugging #72757
  • Can't see primary constructor variables in debugger #74082
  • Opt into client side STJ serialization #73317

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust overload resolution priority from LDM #74428
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove ifdefs related to formatting #74424
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WithDocumentAttributes #74421
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74413
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump razor for serialization changes #74412
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix SourceCodeKind setting #74294
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert SymbolSearchOptions to editorconfig options #74378
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into 'roles' #74419
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Display lifted primary constructor parameters in watch window … #74188
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Switch first-class Span tests to C#13 #74414
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Improve performance of SourceText.LineInfo indexer. #74267
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Use modreq to prevent consumption of instance extensions from other compilers #74405
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Merge 'main' into features/FirstClassSpan #74406
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Smart Rename: Provide additional context for renamed symbol #73873
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to STJ for client side LSP serialization #74364
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Escape `record` keywords #74227
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Parse `field` as a contextual keyword #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • With project info #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Fix interceptors bugs involving ref this parameters #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid BuildHost crash in Mono due to missing types #74392
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fill some gaps in Test Plan for "Ref Struct Interfaces" feature #74389
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Improve error recovery for null coalescing assignment operator #74218
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove assembly loading light-up from scripting #74409
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in AnalyzerFileReference.GetAnalyzerTypeNameMap #74411
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Merge changes from a single DidChange notification #74268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add new `ModelMetadata` constructor for EndpointMetadataApiDescriptionProvider #56867
    9.0-preview7
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, https, json #56861
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #56860
  • ValidateAuthenticationStateAsync manual trigger #56859
  • BadHttpRequestException even before reaching controller action #56857
  • VS-CODE HTTP launch configuration trusted certificate required #56853
  • When using AddJwtBearer it can not read .well-known/openid-configuration if it contains an object #56852
  • Assets not found when calling app outside it's directory. Error: `filename.br` could not be found. #56851
  • Checkbox not re-rendering correctly when value of last clicked checkbox is changed in code #56847
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.7.24366.3] .NET 8 Blazor Web App(WebAssembly) get an error: "TypeError: ar.monoStringToStringUnsafe is not a function" when are running with .NET 9 #56846
  • Perf regression: fortunes, json, plaintext #56845
  • Perf regression: json, json, mapaction #56844
  • Perf improvement: https, json_middleware #56843
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware, json_middleware #56842
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware, single_query #56841
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException #56839

Closed

  • Connection Close Behavior on HTTP1.0 Requests #56223
    9.0-preview7
  • Como Hackear o Instagram de Alguém 2024 #56865
  • Produces generic variants of `ProducesProblem` extension methods #56178
    9.0-preview7
  • MapAssets System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: (Parameter 'offset') Actual value was 0. #56371
    9.0-rc1
  • Expose additional info about properties and JSON types in OpenApiSchemaTransformerContext #56584
    9.0.0
  • [Blazor MAUI] Byte Array Interop Still Serializes `byte[]` as string? #56850
  • Uncaught Error: No interop methods are registered for renderer 1 #56813
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, plaintext #56836
  • Output caching middleware : Is Etag only compared to server cached data? #55414

PullRequests

Created

  • Use minified .js files from submodule in source-build #56864
    area-blazor
  • Add an explanatory comment to DuplexPipe #56863
    area-networking

Merged

  • Add direct references to System.Text.Json in a few places #56866
    area-commandlinetools, 9.0-preview7
  • Add generic variants of ProducesProblem and ProducesValidationProblem #56810
    area-web-frameworks, 9.0-preview7
  • Apply schema transformers on properties and other subschemas #56709
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0-preview7
  • [release/6.0] Prepend ? when dealing with runtime query string prefixes #56837
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.33
  • Do not close connection for http1.0 when client request connection keep-alive #56558
    community-contribution, area-networking, 9.0-preview7

Updated

  • Support key deletion in Data Protection #53860
    area-dataprotection
  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Make ApiExplorer for minimal APIs trim-compatible #56827
    feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Add an option on the `ExceptionHandlerOptions` to select status codes based on exceptions #56616
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Initial implementation of PAR in OIDC Handler #55069
    community-contribution, area-security
  • Allow Response Caching for Authorized Endpoints #56768
    community-contribution, area-middleware
  • IBrowserFile FormDataConverter Mismatch between Name and FileName #56833
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Fix Blazor WebAssembly perf benchmarks #56811
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, area-perf
  • Port "Add direct references to S.T.J. in tools" to `main` #56704
    area-commandlinetools
  • Perf: ReasonPhrases as Array instead of Dictionary #56304
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • _isVirtual has to be set as true in the context of DataTarget.LoadDump. #4796

Updated

  • `dotnet-trace collect` hangs without completing collection on Linux #3935
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add support for ISOSDacInterface15 - MethodTable enumeration api #4767

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HybridWebView: Clean up duplicate path manipulization/normalization code #23668
  • HybridWebView configuration to enable F12/browser dev tools #23663
  • Remove bumptech.glide.load.data java package from maui app #23660
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 6] Fonts are randomly left out the MSIX package #23659
  • Implement DebugSettings.LayoutCycleTracingLevel #23656
  • Can't release the C# object referenced by razor component in BlazorWebView #23654
  • Suddenly, iOS crashes with “Model building is not supported when publishing with NativeAOT. Use a compiled model” #23653
  • [Windows] App works in Debug and Release configurations but crashes in Microsoft Store #23652
  • CollectionView DisconnectHandler SelectionMode=Multiple Windows exception #23649
  • Android Crashes with "This window is already associated with an active Activity" when we use AppFlip #23645
  • MobSF vulnerability analysis #23644
  • .NET MAUI App程序启动失败 #23643

Closed

  • MAUI template issues for projects with tricky characters such as '&' (maui-blazor-web) #23105
    9.0-preview7
  • .NET MAUI CarouselView Items Not Visible in Release Mode #19357
    Backlog
  • Binding CollectionView/CarouselView to lists of primitive types doesn't work on Release Builds #16021
    Backlog
  • XamlC resolves x:DataType incorrectly #11956
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Improve information/experience around x:DataType behaviour in Debug vs Release #21735
    .NET 8 SR8
  • when I release an APP, it can't display binding data properly, but it will display properly when I run it in debug mode. #16414
    Backlog
  • Custom FlyoutIcon visible although FlyoutBehavior set to disabled on Android an IOS #9037
    Backlog
  • Border on iOS redraws with 1 frame lag, creating flashes of (1) square corners on redraws, and (2) old background color before new color update #23070
  • [MAUI]I7_PullToRefresh-Pulling down to refresh using refreshview for Horizontal grid doesn't work. #23529
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Navigation title for split flyout detail page overrides the flyout title #22233
    Backlog
  • Add empty .NET MAUI Blazor template #9126
    9.0-preview7
  • favicon.ico is not needed in MAUI Blazor Hybrid application #16542
    9.0-preview7
  • [MAUI] Unable to scroll up and down #23309
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [tests] Fix iOS screenshot for sonoma #23667
    area-testing, testing-flakiness
  • [android] use cached value for `GetDisplayDensity()` #23666
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [android] improve performance of `ImageHandler.PlatformArrange()` #23665
    platform/android 🤖, t/perf
  • [ci] Fix maestro publishing for stable packages #23664
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Use drop service for SDK insertion artifacts #23658
  • [X] deprecate fontImageExtension #23657
  • [net8.0] Update net8.0 to Sonoma and iOS #23655
    area-infrastructure
  • Add the embedding sample #23647
  • [Binding SG] Add warning when referencing results of other source generators #23646

Merged

  • [X] do not apply Bindings if DataType doesnt match #22056
    area-xaml
  • Hide FlyoutIcon when FlyoutBehavior set to disabled #20087
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Re-enable GetServiceOrCreateInstance with Shell #23632
    t/docs 📝
  • Detect MauiCALayer being rendered offscreen #23648
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix pull to refresh w/ horz item layouts #23547
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-general
  • Add empty (no sample content) option for Blazor Hybrid #23615
    area-blazor, area-templates
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #23639
    area-infrastructure
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #23638
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [Windows] Make `WebView.CaptureAsync()` work #23474
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • Add embedding sample and code #23642
  • [net9.0][Enhancement] FontImageSource defaults and style #23602
    proposal/open, area-fonts, community ✨
  • [Docs] Added pending inline comments to Page class #20933
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [Binding SG] Dogfood binding source generator in the MAUI codebase #23393
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Being able to use temp table with ef core linq query #34243
  • .Include with navigation collection with same name as other [NotMapped] property fails with InvalidOperationException #34242

Closed

  • Make many to many relationship on same domain model #34224
  • Add UpdateAsync method. #34237
  • Problem with using PasswordSignInAsync in ASP.NET Identity with EF Core. #34238
  • SqliteConventionSetBuilder.CreateModelBuilder() produces incorrect migrations #34222

PullRequests

Created

  • API review updates #34241
  • Revert "impements #11261 sequence cache support" for 9.0 #34240

Updated

  • Stop including the discriminator in the JSON id by default #34208
  • Introduce UseAzureSynapse and UseAzureSql #34052
  • Fix to #34211 - Issue occurs when trying to generate query string when mapping entity with json to a view with a custom schema #34239
